title: NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Associate I and Other Posts
description: The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Associate I and Project Technical Support III Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.Sc, and M.V.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible can...
